task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 261Â°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my view upwards to see the roof.
I can now see the top of the building, and from the previous view I saw the bottom, so I can estimate the height by counting the floors and multiplying by an average height per floor.
